page.title: 08THE CHILDREN - CHESTERTON
page.content: There are 12 children in the Chesterton area. Only 2 children go to the Combined School in Harbury.One goes to Southam High School, one to a Combined Church School in Southam and the rest go to private schools.The two in Harbury who have lived in the village all their lives, travel to school by taxi. It is paid for by the County Council. Their parents work at local farms.Often in winter the village is cut off by the snow and the children cannot go to school. They go shopping in Leamington Spa. There are no organized activities for the children in the area. In their spare time they play in the woods and fields.
